original_text: For how great is his goodness, and how great is his beauty! corn shall make the young men cheerful, and new wine the maids.
korean_text: 그의 형통함과 그의 아름다움이 어찌 그리 큰지 곡식은 청년을, 새 포도주는 처녀를 강건하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: For how great is his goodness
and how great is his beauty!
corn shall make young men cheerful

sentences.korean_translation: 새 포도주는 처녀들을 즐겁게 할 것이다.
